story_10_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Argh! We must not have rested enough 
after that battle with Hapu, Rockruff... 
Still, I can’t believe we lost to those goons.
story_10_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hmm, what have we here? It looks like the boy
has attracted a whole swarm of sync pairs right
into our trap.
story_10_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That one looks like he might be the
leader of the bunch.
story_10_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Your little friend here was too weak to put up
much of a fight, sadly.
story_10_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Don’t listen to this foolish bully, Paulo.
story_10_04000/2401_0401_0900_10:
It seems you’re not one to put up with
foolish nonsense, either...
Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!
story_10_04000/2401_0302_1000_10: You’d better take that back, mister!
story_10_04000/2401_0402_1100_10:
It seems you’re not one to put up with
foolish nonsense, either...
Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!
